languages.text: "Слыхал про Саргону? Арбитры до него добрались. Выпьем, чтоб пустота была пухом этому гаду".
"Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."
languages.original_text: "Слыхал про Саргону? Арбитры до него добрались. Выпьем, чтоб пустота была пухом этому гаду".

traits.locale_text: "Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that — may the bastard rest in the void's cold embrace."
"Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that — may the bastard rest in the void's cold embrace."
"Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that — may the bastard rest in the void's cold embrace."
"Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."
"Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."

languages.text: 「サルゴナのことを聞いたか？アービトレイターたちにやられたらしい。乾杯しようぜ！あのクソ野郎が虚空の冷たい抱擁の中で眠ることを願ってな」
languages.original_text: "Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."

traits.locale_text: 「サルゴナのことを聞いたか？アービトレイターたちにやられたらしい。乾杯しようぜ！あのクソ野郎が虚空の冷たい抱擁の中で眠ることを願ってな」
「サルゴナのことを聞いたか？アービトレイターたちにやられたらしい。乾杯しようぜ！あのクソ野郎が虚空の冷たい抱擁の中で眠ることを願ってな」

languages.text: "Habt Ihr von Sargona gehört? Die Arbitratoren haben ihn erwischt. Wir sollten darauf trinken, dass der Bastard in der kalten Umarmung der Leere ruht."
languages.original_text: "Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr von Sargona gehört? Die Arbitratoren haben ihn erwischt. Wir sollten darauf trinken, dass der Bastard in der kalten Umarmung der Leere ruht."

languages.text: "Sargona'yı duydunuz mu? Yargıcılar yakalayıp işini bitirmiş. Bunun şerefine içilir. O alçak, uçsuzun soğuk kucağında çürüsün!"
languages.original_text: "Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Sargona'yı duydunuz mu? Yargıcılar yakalayıp işini bitirmiş. Bunun şerefine içilir. O alçak, uçsuzun soğuk kucağında çürüsün!"
"Sargona'yı duydunuz mu? Yargıcılar yakalayıp işini bitirmiş. Bunun şerefine içilir. O alçak, uçsuzun soğuk kucağında çürüsün!"

languages.text: «¿Ha oído lo de Sargona? Los Arbitrator se ocuparon de él. Brindemos por que ese malnacido se pudra en el frío del vacío».
languages.original_text: "Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha oído lo de Sargona? Los Arbitrator se ocuparon de él. Brindemos por que ese malnacido se pudra en el frío del vacío».

languages.text: “你听说萨戈纳了吗？那群法务官把他干掉了。干杯吧，愿这个杂种在虚空冰冷的怀抱中安息。”
languages.original_text: "Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."

traits.locale_text: “你听说萨戈纳了吗？那群法务官把他干掉了。干杯吧，愿这个杂种在虚空冰冷的怀抱中安息。”
“你听说萨戈纳了吗？那群法务官把他干掉了。干杯吧，愿这个杂种在虚空冰冷的怀抱中安息。”

languages.text: « Vous avez su, pour Sargona ? Les arbitrators l'ont rattrapé. Trinquons au fait que ce salaud pourrira à jamais dans le vide ! »
languages.original_text: "Have you heard about Sargona? The Arbitrators got to him. Let's drink to that bastard resting in the void's cold embrace."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez su, pour Sargona ? Les arbitrators l'ont rattrapé. Trinquons au fait que ce salaud pourrira à jamais dans le vide ! »
« Vous avez su, pour Sargona ? Les arbitrators l'ont rattrapé. Trinquons à cette bonne nouvelle, et puisse ce salaud pourrir à jamais dans le vide ! »
